channel.title: 彭博-市场
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博-市场news的种子

item.title: 消息人士称，Reddit 及其卖方股东在首次公开募股（IPO）中筹集了 7.48 亿美元，股票定价处于市场定价范围的顶端
item.description:
Reddit and its selling shareholders raised $748 million, pricing shares in an IPO at the top of a marketed range, sources say https://t.co/DdCImIqECH

— Bloomberg (@business) March 20, 2024

item.title: 澳大利亚煤炭生产商正越来越多地涉足高息私人贷款，因为贷款人希望取代因环境、社会和公司治理问题而不情愿的银行
item.description:
Australian coal producers are increasingly dabbling in high-interest private loans as lenders look to replace reluctant banks that are held back by ESG concerns https://t.co/fooxAHamKM

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 反垄断监督机构表示，新西兰政府应考虑增加 Kiwibank 获得资本的机会，使其成为 "颠覆性的竞争对手"。
item.description:
The New Zealand government should consider increasing Kiwibank’s access to capital to turn it into a “disruptive competitor,” the antitrust watchdog said. https://t.co/yhDkLHt93m

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）的语气开始有点像长途旅行中的父母。渴望降息的投资者不断追问："我们到了吗？他反复的回答归结为："快了，只是还没到"
item.description:
Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell is starting to sound a bit like a parent on an extended road trip. Investors eager for interest-rate cuts keep asking, “Are we there yet?” His repeated reply boils down to: “Soon, just not yet” https://t.co/YDKKXy5vj4

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 巴西国家石油公司（Petrobras）本月将转向液化天然气进口，以确保供应，同时对一条主要海上管道进行维护工作
item.description:
Petrobras is turning to liquefied natural gas imports this month to secure supplies while it carries out maintenance work at a major offshore pipeline https://t.co/SoumzjbkYp

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 全球最大的乳制品出口商恒天然合作社集团（Fonterra Cooperative Group）因利润率提高而增加了上半年的股息。
item.description:
Fonterra Cooperative Group, the world’s largest dairy exporter, increased its first-half dividend after improving margins boosted its earnings. https://t.co/AfvRkznxPS

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会要求各公司提供有关与以太坊基金会交易的信息，这是审查以太坊各方面问题的一部分。
item.description:
The US Securities and Exchange Commission has demanded information from companies about dealings with the Ethereum Foundation as part of a review of aspects of Ether https://t.co/dnacF3HonE

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 加拿大国家银行的一个部门称，加拿大各省为弥补预算缺口，将比去年发行更多的债务。
item.description:
Canadian provinces are set to issue more debt than they did last year as they look to plug budget shortfalls, according to a unit of the National Bank of Canada https://t.co/XIX81xkia4

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 全球投资者和斯里兰卡官员预计将于下周开始旨在重组 120 亿美元违约全球债券的谈判。
item.description:
Global investors and Sri Lanka officials expect to start negotiations aimed at restructuring $12 billion in defaulted global bonds next week. https://t.co/1PEFKEK6nY

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 另类资产管理公司 TPG 正在洽谈收购加拿大公寓物业房地产投资信托基金（Canadian Apartment Properties REIT）的成品房业务
item.description:
Alternative asset manager TPG is in talks to buy the manufactured housing business of Canadian Apartment Properties REIT https://t.co/DtLgh8B2jr

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 在人工智能硬件需求的推动下，美国最大的计算机内存芯片制造商美光公司（Micron）给出了本季度强劲的收入预期，并在尾盘跳涨。
item.description:
Micron, the largest US maker of computer memory chips, jumped in late trading after giving a strong revenue forecast for the current quarter, buoyed by demand for artificial intelligence hardware. https://t.co/oWRQ4bAuI6

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔表示，美联储将 "很快 "开始缩减资产负债表。
item.description:
The Federal Reserve reiterated its intention to continue reducing its balance sheet by as much as $95 billion per month, with Fed Chair Jerome Powell saying that the process will start “fairly soon" https://t.co/u23JcEJEZC pic.twitter.com/2CDSRlhLwz

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 全球最大的碳捕集项目将于本周提交许可申请
item.description:
The biggest carbon-capture project in the world will submit permit applications this week https://t.co/GymKglLDI9

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 美国人越来越富，为市政债券市场提供了大量机会
item.description:
Americans are getting richer, setting up the municipal bond market for a bounty of opportunity https://t.co/luqlqZ7r1Y

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 随着跨山公司（Trans Mountain）在不列颠哥伦比亚省崎岖不平的弗雷泽河谷（Fraser Valley）的坚硬岩石中钻探出 715 英里管道的最后一段，加拿大大型石油管道的启动日期将在几周内揭晓。
item.description:
The startup date for Canada’s mega oil pipeline should be known within weeks as Trans Mountain drills through hard rock in British Columbia’s rugged Fraser Valley for the final stretch of the 715-mile conduit. https://t.co/yJ4lx0IMnU

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 亿万富翁标致家族披露了其在倒闭的奥地利房地产帝国 Signa 的投资损失程度。
item.description:
The billionaire Peugeot family has revealed the extent of its losses from investments in the collapsed Austrian property empire Signa. https://t.co/8CwpseLHLX

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 在米莱伊的休克疗法启动之前，阿根廷第四季度经济就已下滑
item.description:
Argentina’s Economy Slumped in Fourth Quarter Even Before Milei’s Shock Therapy Kicked In https://t.co/Oa456Lz0rF

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 以下是我们从美联储 3 月利率决议和主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔的新闻发布会上了解到的信息
item.description:
Here's what we learned from the Federal Reserve's March interest-rate decision and Chair Jerome Powell's news conference https://t.co/Km5o9LRrqE

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 德国联邦银行行长约阿希姆-纳格尔表示，他对欧洲经济的担忧超过了对本国经济的担忧
item.description:
Bundesbank President Joachim Nagel said he’s more worried about Europe’s economy than that of his homeland https://t.co/ni6z3n4aKq

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 亿万富翁帕特里克-德拉希（Patrick Drahi）旗下 Altice 公司的高管们制定了更激进的杠杆率目标，并表示债权人将承担帮助实现目标的责任，这引发了该公司债券的暴跌
item.description:
Executives at billionaire Patrick Drahi’s Altice set more aggressive leverage targets and said creditors will be on the hook to help meet them, triggering a plunge in its bonds https://t.co/rs7AcKrOC4

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 如果人人都是第一，那么就没有人是第一：在风险公司越来越多地只在贷款市场上借款之后，这是美国债务市场的资金经理和分析师们所担心的问题。
item.description:
If everyone is first, then no one is first: That’s a concern for money managers and analysts in US debt markets after risky companies have increasingly borrowed solely in the loan market. https://t.co/6GtqNEbVuS

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 石油管道制造商 Tenaris 的亿万富豪总裁保罗-罗卡（Paolo Rocca）表示，人们对哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）能够推动阿根廷页岩矿床的开发寄予厚望。
item.description:
Paolo Rocca, billionaire chief of oil-pipe maker Tenaris, says expectations are high that Javier Milei can turbo-charge development of Argentina’s shale deposits https://t.co/uXUzWCdXdm

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 点阵图：美联储所谓的点阵图显示，联邦基金利率的年末预测中值保持在4.6%。从我们的免费直播博客获取更多更新信息，请点击此处：
item.description:
DOT PLOT: The Fed's so-called dot plot shows the median year-end projection for the federal funds rate stayed at 4.6%.

Fed policymakers held their benchmark interest rate steady in their March meeting. Get more updates from our free live blog, here: https://t.co/oN3OdPjXl9 pic.twitter.com/Vpsd53BF1z

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 美联储将保持减持债券的步伐，即使过剩的流动性继续从金融体系中流失。
item.description:
The Fed will maintain the pace at which it’s reducing bond holdings, even as excess liquidity continues to drain from the financial system. https://t.co/l89uE4ib32

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 在美联储决策者修订利率预测，继续预计年底前将降息三个季度后，国债收益率下跌
item.description:
Treasury yields declined after Fed policy makers’ revised interest-rate forecasts continued to anticipate three quarter-point cuts by year-end https://t.co/BbbXPD3M62

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: "我不太担心通胀会上升，"@艾莉森-施拉格说。"另一个担忧是，通胀会保持原样"。请收看我们的直播，了解更多分析：
item.description:
"I'm not so concerned that inflation is going to rise," says @AllisonSchrager. "Another concern is that inflation is just gonna stay where it is."

Tune into our livestream for more analysis: https://t.co/3YH6GL0qDh

— Bloomberg Opinion (@opinion) March 20, 2024

item.title: 以下是美联储周三利率决议的主要要点
item.description:
Here are key takeaways from the Federal Reserve's interest-rate decision on Wednesday https://t.co/4beypWnWMa

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：美联储官员维持今年降息三个季度的展望，但预测在近期通胀回升后，2025 年的降息次数将少于以往
item.description:
BREAKING: Federal Reserve officials maintained their outlook for three quarter-point rate cuts this year but forecast fewer cuts than before in 2025 following a recent uptick in inflation https://t.co/vq4SNaUxGr pic.twitter.com/O5NNJaNfqK

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 美联储维持今年降息三个季度的展望，但预测 2025 年的降息次数将少于以往，因为近期通胀率有所回升
item.description:
The Fed maintained its outlook for three quarter-point rate cuts this year but forecast fewer cuts than before in 2025 following a recent uptick in inflation https://t.co/kpyXAxU99v

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 20, 2024

item.title: 现在直播：今天是美联储日！敬请收看@JonathanJLevin与@johnauthers、@AllisonSchrager和@DataTrekMB的分析⬇️。
item.description:
LIVE NOW: It’s Fed Day!

Tune in as @JonathanJLevin joins @johnauthers, @AllisonSchrager and @DataTrekMB for analysis ⬇️ https://t.co/IeIA9qSmjP

— Bloomberg Opinion (@opinion) March 20, 2024
